typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(each(match(1==1), $$ = iifNull($$,toString(null())))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Column1 as string,
		Column2 as string,
		Column3 as string,
		Column4 as timestamp,
		Column5 as string,
		Column6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Column1 = Column_1,
		Column2 = Column_2,
		Column3 = Column_3,
		Column4 = Column_4,
		Column5 = Column_5,
		Column6 = Column_6
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
